alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; North Laramie Range; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:58PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Albany County through 745 PM MDT... At 658 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Rock River, or 42 miles northwest of Laramie, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wheatland Reservoir 3 around 725 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Wyoming.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; North Laramie Range; Shirley Basin
